name: Provisions of chapter controlling Note Chapter heading amended by L 1974, c 254, 1(1).
text: Provisions of chapter controlling.  Insofar as this chapter is inconsistent with the provisions of any law or charter, this chapter shall be controlling.  The powers conferred by this chapter shall be in addition and supplemental to the powers conferred by any other law or charter. [L 1964, c 58, pt of §2; Supp, §140A-8; HRS ]
